ans: - The hackathon is open for Students from all over India. It is the right place for anyone who's interested in learning and innovating with their ideas.

ques: How long is the hackathon going to last?
ans: - The hackathon will be a 48 hour long online hackathon and only shortlisted teams will be present in offline mode

ques: How do I register for the hackathon?
Where can I find the hackathon rules and guidelines?
ans: - You can download the official document containing the hackathon rules and guidelines here.

ques: What is the registration cost of Agnethon?
ans: - Registration for Agnethon is completely free

ques: What if my queries are still not clear
ans: - Feel free to email us at 'agnethon.2024@gmail.com' for further clarification.
